name: Sticky Bois
description:
This is a short puzzle script thing that I made a while ago and forgot about. I reopened the program today because I wanted to start something new for Ludum Dare and it was still there, so I figured I'd release it. 

Contains 4 levels. I don't think they're very hard except maybe the last one

walk into or past sticky bois to have them stick to you. stick all the bois to beat a level. Inspired by katamari I think.
